column5: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column7: Analyse test results to inform diagnosis or treatment
column11: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column15: Develop health assessment methods or programs
column17: Assist health care practitioners during examinations or treatments
column19: Refer patients to other health care practitioners or health resources
column23: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
column25: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
column27: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
